data.why:
1. I want this bug
    https://rt.cpan.org/Public/Bug/Display.html?id=1525 to be fixed, and
    I think that I will need ID to do something with it.

    2. I am writing wiktionary to stardict exporter
    http://wiktionary-export.nataraj.su
    (svn://svn.nataraj.su/wiktionary-export/trunk) and started several
    perl modules that do some job, nobody does (i.e. StarDict writer
    that really works, for example). This should be added to CPAN sooner
    or later.
